mapper.select: select id, out_num, p_num, product_number, create_time, modified_time from biz_out_stock_info where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into biz_out_stock_info(out_num, p_num, product_number, create_time, modified_time) values (#{outNum}, #{pNum}, #{productNumber}, #{createTime}, #{modifiedTime})

insert into biz_out_stock_info(out_num, p_num, product_number, create_time, modified_time) values
(#{entity.outNum}, #{entity.pNum}, #{entity.productNumber}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.modifiedTime})

insert into biz_out_stock_info(out_num, p_num, product_number, create_time, modified_time) values
(#{entity.outNum}, #{entity.pNum}, #{entity.productNumber}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.modifiedTime})
on duplicate key update out_num = values(out_num), p_num = values(p_num), product_number = values(product_number), create_time = values(create_time), modified_time = values(modified_time)
mapper.update:
update biz_out_stock_info
out_num = #{outNum},
p_num = #{pNum},
product_number = #{productNumber},
create_time = #{createTime},
modified_time = #{modifiedTime},
where id = #{id}
